label: specifiedPeriod
comment: A delimited period specified for this CS engineering coordinate reference system.

rangeIncludes.comment: A period of time from a start date time onwards up to an end date time.

domainIncludes.comment: A coordinate reference system that is used in a contextually local sense to describe the relative locations of objects in which coordinates of points are recorded in a Coordinate System (CS) (reference ISO 19111).
